thread.title: BRIEF-Ocean Rig UDW Announces $100 Mln Prepayment Of $450 Mln Senior Secured Credit Facility

title: BRIEF-Ocean Rig UDW Announces $100 Mln Prepayment Of $450 Mln Senior Secured Credit Facility

organizations.name: mln senior secured credit facility reuters

text: March 21, 2018 / 1:01 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Ocean Rig UDW Announces $100 Mln Prepayment Of $450 Mln Senior Secured Credit Facility Reuters Staff March 21 (Reuters) - Ocean Rig Udw Inc: * OCEAN RIG UDW INC. ANNOUNCES $100 MILLION PREPAYMENT OF $450 MILLION SENIOR SECURED CREDIT FACILITY * OCEAN RIG UDW - ‍FOLLOWING PREPAYMENT, TOTAL OUTSTANDING BORROWINGS UNDER TERM LOAN REDUCED TO $350 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
